summary: TRANSMISSION WENT OUT IT STARTED THAT WHEN YOU PUT IT REVERSE IT DIDN'T  WANT TO GO THEN PUT INTO DRIVE THEN REVERSE IT WORKED. THEN WHILE DRIVING WE PULLED INTO PARKING SPOT AND TRIED TO REVERSE IT WAS TOTALLY GONE.     WINDSHIED WIPERS STOP WORKING ON AND OFF. YOU CAN HEAR THE  MOTOR THEY WON'T  MOVE AND AT MOST   TIMES IT EFFECTS THE WINDSHIELD WASHER FLUID SO IT DOESN'T WORK.
